channel.title: How would I set out this yell command?

item.title: How would I set out this yell command?
item.dc:creator: @Zezzma1410 Zezzma1410
item.description:
@Zezzma1410 wrote:

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{

            if(playerRights == 3) {
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner] " +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);

if(playerRights == 2) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Administrator] " +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
if(playerRights == 1) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Moderator] " +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
if(playerIsMember == 1) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Premium] " +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); //make it yell normally if ur not a staff
}
}
}[/code]

Try this and tell me wat u get

Read full topic
item.source: How would I set out this yell command?

item.title: How would I set out this yell command?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Hi, here is the command I tried to make:

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{

            if(playerRights == 3) {
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner] " +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);

if(playerRights == 2) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Administrator] " +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
if(playerRights == 1) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Moderator] " +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
if(playerIsMember == 1) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Premium] " +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
if(playerIsMember == 0) && (playerRights == 0) {
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); //make it yell normally if ur not a staff
}
}
}[/code]

This is the error I get:

client.java:11368: illegal start of expression if(playerIsMember == 0) && (playerRights == 0) { ^ client.java:11368: ';' expected if(playerIsMember == 0) && (playerRights == 0) { ^ client.java:11369: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ client.java:12029: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 4 errors Server Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Does anyone no how I can fix?

Thanks.

Musicmad

Read full topic
